definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: It indicates that telomerase participates in the repair process of DNA injury induced by ionizing radiation.
sentences.chinese: 推测端粒酶参与电离辐射诱导DNA损伤的修复。

sentences.english: An atom is stripped of all electrons by ionization.
sentences.chinese: 一个原子由于电离而被剥掉其全部电子。

sentences.english: At the top is the super-hot corona, which is made of structures such as loops and streams of ionized gas.
sentences.chinese: 最顶层的是超热日冕，由日冕环和电离气体流组成。

sentences.english: Just picking up on this ionization energy.
sentences.chinese: 了解一下这个电离能就行了。

sentences.english: Too many charge concentrate at a sharp point may ionize the air and produced electric wind.
sentences.chinese: 太多电荷集中在尖角时，会令空气电离，产生电风。

sentences.english: But the gas can ionize above 2000 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 而气体在2000度以上才能电离。

sentences.english: The wind comes in, carries a magnetic field, which wraps around the ionosphere of the planet.
sentences.chinese: 太阳风过来时携带的磁场把行星的电离层缠绕住。

sentences.english: And we can calculate the ionization energy.
The ionisation radiation has to each arrogant living thing eliminates the function.
sentences.chinese: 电离辐射对各种傲生物都有杀灭作用。

sentences.english: The energetic light from these young stars ionizes the existing gas.
sentences.chinese: 由年轻恒星发出的高能光线使存在的气体电离。

sentences.english: A gas - filled ionization chamber uses this principle.
sentences.chinese: 充气电离室就是利用这一原理。

sentences.english: Nuclear radiation can cause ionization or excitation material, it is called ionizing radiation.
sentences.chinese: 核辐射可以使物质引起电离或激发，故称为电离辐射。

sentences.english: Nuclear radiation can cause ionization or excitation material, it is called ionizing radiation.
sentences.chinese: 核辐射可以使物质引起电离或激发，故称为电离辐射。

sentences.english: Ionospheric delay is one of the largest error sources for single-frequency GPS navigation and Positioning applications.
sentences.chinese: 电离层延迟是单频GPS导航定位的主要误差源之一。

sentences.english: All of them can be used as secondary standard Rontgen meter and in protection dose measurement.
sentences.chinese: 上述电离室可作次级标准伦琴计和防护剂量测量用。

sentences.english: The Ionization Total Dose Radiation Effects and Hardening Techniques of FPGA Microcircuit;
sentences.chinese: 目的评估长期小剂量电离辐射对晶状体的影响。
